article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WQklt4 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: The Story Behind This Photo Of A RAF Pilot

div.p: Remember that photo of the RAF pilot getting his hair cut between missions?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YFs7n8 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Evolution Of The New York Driver's License In Pictures

div.p: New York State first began issuing paper licenses to chauffeurs in 1910, and the shape, form and style have changed over the past century, adapting to new laws and technologies. The following is a sampling of how the license has evolved.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YFs7n8&via=Digg&text=Evolution Of The New York Driver's License In Pictures

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-112kqHV hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: A Bridge Implosion In Three Speeds

div.p: The implosion of the Marble Falls Bridge in Marble Falls, TX shown at regular speed, in slow motion, and in super slow motion.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/112kqHV&via=Digg&text=A Bridge Implosion In Three Speeds

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WadbgV hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Anatomy Of A Snitch

div.p: It was one of the worst killing sprees in Washington history. The defendants stood accused of killing five young people and wounding eight. The case against them hinged on the testimony of their accomplice Nathaniel Simms. What made him break the code of the streets and help send his friends to prison?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WadbgV&via=Digg&text=Anatomy Of A Snitch

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZL533Z hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: NO WAY OF SHUTTING THIS DOWN

h2.a: CNN Grieves That Guilty Verdict Ruined 'Promising' Lives Of Steubenville Rapists

div.p: CNN broke the news on Sunday of a guilty verdict in a rape case in Steubenville, Ohio by lamenting that the “promising” lives of the rapists had been ruined.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZL533Z&via=Digg&text=CNN Grieves That Guilty Verdict Ruined 'Promising' Lives Of Steubenville Rapists

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XiCDOy hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Apple Is Losing The War – Of Words

div.p: Besides its ads, Apple says very little, confident numbers will do the talking. This no longer works as others have seized the opportunity to drive the narrative.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XiCDOy&via=Digg&text=Apple Is Losing The War – Of Words

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YjNnfV hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Pope Wades Into Crowd Before 1st Window Appearance

div.p: Breaking with tradition, Pope Francis delivered off-the-cuff remarks about God's power to forgive instead of reading from a written speech for the first Sunday window appearance of his papacy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YjNnfV&via=Digg&text=Pope Wades Into Crowd Before 1st Window Appearance

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16CyJqH hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: A Mesmerizing Slow-Motion Drive Down The Streets Of NYC

div.p: Combining the capabilities of a high-speed camera with the basic idea that “there are enough [magical moments] happening every moment of any given day,” New York artist James Nares is currently captivating audiences at the Metropolitan Museum of Art with his mesmerizing video “Street.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16CyJqH&via=Digg&text=A Mesmerizing Slow-Motion Drive Down The Streets Of NYC

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YjcxLu hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: PISSED THEY DIDN'T GET AN UPGRADE

h2.a: Penguins Allowed To Enjoy 'Obsolete iPad'

div.p: Penguins are pretty great looking, but they offer more than just swagger. They can play iPad games and have a good time doing it. Or, you know, not really grasp what's going on.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YjcxLu&via=Digg&text=Penguins Allowed To Enjoy 'Obsolete iPad'

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YGYmlO hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: What Came Before Photoshop

div.p: "Photoshopping" has these days become synonymous with photo manipulation. But the practice is much older than the computer software — about as old as photography itself.

h2.a: Airport Posts Facebook Pic Of Crash To Boast About Safety
